description.original: toggle sidebars double-clicking middle mouse button or each sidebar clicking middle mouse button and moving mouse towards the corresponding sidebar.
description.translation: toggle sidebars double-clicking middle mouse button or each sidebar clicking middle mouse button and moving mouse towards the corresponding sidebar.
